name: Around Saigon on scooter
description: There are so many ways to experience life in a city, but it's always the best to watch and do things like a real local. And here it is, on the back of a scooter, you will experience things by all senses - you will see it, hear it, feel it, taste it and smell it. I will make you feel like you are hanging out with your closest friend, going around the city, eating street food and visiting history places. Just ask me ;)
